item.title: Acid Lash Weapon
item.fluff: A stream of acid lashes out from this melee weapon, burning a target who might otherwise be out of reach

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectMake a melee basic attack using this weapon. For this attack, you have reach 5 instead of what it would normally be, and your attack has the Acid keyword instead of any damage keywords it might normally have, with all damage changed to acid damage.

item.title: Aegis Blade
item.fluff: This blade allows you to place your aegis on all nearby foes with a single word of power

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy marked by your arcane aegis

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 3 (each enemy in burst); Each target is marked by you (save ends).
Arcane Aegis: Targets count as being marked by your arcane aegis class power.

item.title: Aftershock Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon sends ripples of force toward nearby foes on a telling blow

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this weapon, each enemy adjacent to the target of the critical hit is knocked prone.

item.title: Alfsair Spear
item.fluff: This spear is a favorite weapon among druidic traditions

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are proficient with totem implements, you can choose to treat this spear as a totem implement.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou score a critical hit against an enemy with this spear
EffectThe triggering enemy is dazed until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Anathema Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon shines in the presence of aberrant menace, dealing greater damage to such enemies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: When an aberrant creature is within 5 squares of this weapon while it is being wielded, it sheds dim light in a 1-square radius.
You can suppress this the weapon from shedding light as a free action until the end of your next turn. If you do, you receive a mental warning when an aberrant creature is within 5 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectBefore the end of the encounter, the first Weapon attack with this weapon that hits an aberrant creature deals +1[W] extra damage to that creature.
Augment 2: +2[W] extra damage.

item.title: Anointed Mace
item.fluff: This steel mace is scribed with several runes of divine power, one side of its crushing end is marked with a rune of life, the other with a rune of final endings for the restless dead

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls against undead creatures with this weapon.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer hit points with this weapon
EffectClose burst 5 (you or one ally in burst; target must be bloodied); The target regains hit points equal to twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Armblade
item.fluff: This serrated sword blade fits snugly over one of your arms

headline.name: Requirement
headline.text: This enhancement can only be placed on a one-handed weapon.

block.name: Property
block.line: The weapon gains the Free Hand weapon property.
If the weapon has the Off-hand or Light Thrown properties, it is fully retracted when sheathed. While retracted, Perception checks to find it take a -5 penalty.

item.title: Armbow
item.fluff: This magic crossbow generates its own bolts

block.name: Property
block.line: This crossbow becomes a one-handed weapon.
This crossbow does not require ammunition, though you can choose to load it with magical ammunition if you wish.

item.title: Aura-Killer Weapon
item.fluff: The dark purple magic trailing in this weapon's wake shuts down your enemy's instinctive power

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a creature with an active aura

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy that has an aura with an attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy's aura ends, and the enemy cannont reactivate it (save ends).

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus and you knock the target prone on a charge

block.name: Property
block.line: When you charge and make a melee basic attack, the attack deals an additiona +1[W] damage

item.title: Axe of Sundering
item.fluff: This heavy axe looks battered and old, but the slightest touch shows that its cutting edge is sharp and true

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against objects and animates

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls against objects and animates

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Weapon damage rolls, including critical damage, with this weapon deal maximum damage against objects.

item.title: Bard's Songblade
item.fluff: This simple blade whistles as you whip it through the air, creating melodic tones with every swipe

item.title: Bard's Songbow
item.fluff: This simple bow produces beautiful sounds when you pluck its strings

item.title: Battlecrazed Weapon
item.fluff: The weapon seeks blood where it can be found, whether among the enemy or from its wielder

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you deal +1d6 additional damage with this weapon.
Level 14 or 19+2d6 additional damage.
Level 24 or 29+3d6 additional damage.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou deal damage to yourself equal to your level. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.
You are considered bloodied for all purposes until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Blade of Arcane Bonds
item.fluff: Attacks with this blade bind your enemy to you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this blade
EffectThe triggering enemy is marked by you (save ends).

item.title: Bloodclaw Weapon
item.fluff: The hilt of this weapon digs into its wielder's hand, drawing blood while inflicting a more grievous wound upon an enemy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if you use this weapon's attack power on the attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectYou take damage equal to the weapon's plus. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented in any way.
The triggering creature takes additional damage from the triggering attack equal to twice the weapon's plus.
SpecialYou regain the use of this power the first time in an encounter you are bloodied.

item.title: Blood Fury Weapon
item.fluff: Often decorated with bloodstones, these blades or axes are favored by dragonborn barbarians

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you're bloodied

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou are considered bloodied for all purposes until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Byeshk Weapon
item.fluff: The violet-hued metal that makes up this weapon is anathema to creatures alien to the natural cosmos

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy is dazed until the end of your next turn.
If the triggering enemy is an aberrant creature, it also reality-bound until the end of your next turn.
While reality-bound, the enemy is restrained and cannot teleport.

item.title: Carnage Weapon
item.fluff: No amount of time spent cleaning and maintaining this weapon removes the old, ingrained bloodstains that are testament to its power and purpose

block.name: Property
block.line: When you roll the maximum result on at least one of this weapon's damage dice, the target takes extra damage equal to twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Chainsaw Sword
item.fluff: A series of rings and chains line the blade, and beging to move on their own after a few bulls on a loose string attached to the hilt

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d8 damage per plus, and if the target is undead, you can roll the critical damage twice and use the higher result

block.name: Malfunction
block.line: When this sword's power malfunctions or when you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll using sword, a part of you catches in the chain (save ends).
While caught in the chain, you take ongoing 10 damage and a -2 penalty to all attack rolls.
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 15 damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 20 damage.

block.name: Property
block.line: This weapon deals +1[W] extra damage to undead, and only deals half damage to constructs. The GM can decide that some constructs are made of soft enough material to take normal damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with a melee Weapon attack using this weapon

EffectThe triggering creature takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If the triggering attack was a critical hit, the target has a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it attemps against this ongoing damage.
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 10 damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 15 damage.

item.title: Challenge-Seeking Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon is always eager to be introduced to a fresh enemy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy at maximum hit points

block.name: Property
block.line: You deal 1d6 extra damage with this weapon when you hit enemies that are at maximum hit points.
Level 11 or 16: 2d6 extra damage.
Level 21 or 26: 3d6 extra damage.

item.title: Chaos Storm Dagger
item.fluff: This serrated dagger constantly seems to squirm in your hand, as if it were alive

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an arcane ranged at-will attack using this dagger, and your attack roll is an odd number
EffectAfter the triggering attack has been resolved, you use the same attack power against a different target. You gain a power bonus to the attack roll equal to this dagger's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Chieftain's Weapon
item.fluff: This long weapon's haft is covered in runes, each linked together to form a chain that runs in a spiral along its length

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you grant an ally the ability to make a melee or ranged basic attack, that ally gains a +1 item bonus to the attack roll.

item.title: Cloaked Weapon, Lesser
item.fluff: Seemingly unarmed as your foe approaches, you reach behind your band and suddenly this weapon appears in your hands, tilting the odds in your favour

block.name: Property
block.line: When stowed, a lesser cloaked weapon cannot be detected or taken from its owner.

The weapon's owner must speak a chosen word when stowing the weapon somewhere on his or her person. This word becomes the weapon's command word. As a minor action, the weapon's owner can give the command word and reach for the location where the weapon was last stowed, and it will appear in the owner's hand.
The weapon's owner can use the same command word or choose a different one each time the weapon is stowed.
If the weapon's owner dies while the weapon is stowed, the weapon reappears on the owner's body after a year and a day.

item.title: Communal Weapon
item.fluff: Combat can bring some people together, and you can lend aid to your allies with this weapon

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when flanking

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn ally within 5 squares of you makes an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw
EffectThe triggering ally gains a +1 bonus to the triggering roll, check or save.
SpecialYou can use this power a number of times each day equal to 1 + this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Cursed Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon feels comfortable in your hands

block.name: Property
block.line: The first time during an encounter that you hit an enemy with an attack using this weapon, you take a -2 penalty to the attack rolls of attacks that do not include the enemy as a target.
This penalty lasts until the end of the encounter or until the enemy drops to 0 hit points or less.

item.title: Deadstone Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon is carved from tainted stone and imbued with defiling magic that drinks the life of your enemies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThis weapon absorbs power from the hit. The weapon gains a charge equal to the number of hit points of damage the triggering attack dealt.

Before the end of the encounter, the first time you would take damage from an arcane defiling, you automatically gain temporary hit points before taking that damage. The number of temporary hit points equals the charge this weapon has. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Deathstalker Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon leaves a wound that is black and withered, and continues to plague an enemy after the attack has been made

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 10 necrotic damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 15 necrotic damage.
If the triggering attack has the Necrotic keyword, the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this ongoing damage.

item.title: Deathsteel Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon was forged from death ore mined from the Gol Mountains in the Shadowfell, allowing the wielder to cut through an enemy's necromantic resistances

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal damage with a Weapon attack using this weapon, the damage ignores necrotic resistance.

item.title: Defensive Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon glows blue when its wielder takes a defensive posture

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you used your second wind since the start of your previous turn

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take the total defense or second wind action, you gain an item bonus to all your defenses until the start of your next turn. The bonus equals this weapon's plus.

item.title: Dislocating Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon flickers as it strikes, transporting your enemy into a disadvantageous position among your allies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectYou teleport the triggering enemy up to 20 squares to a space adjacent to one of your allies.
2The triggering enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Distance Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon flashes brightly as it hurtles forth, moving with enough force to carry it much farther than normal

block.name: Property
block.line: Increase the weapon's normal range by 5 squares and the long range by 10 squares.

item.title: Divine Medic's Weapon
item.fluff: A divine warrior of any kind can use this weapon to bring victory in the name of his or her deity
item.headline: Critical+1d6 radiant damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a Channel Divinity power during combat, one ally within 10 squares of you regains a number of hit points equal to three times this weapon's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou can use one additional Channel Divinity power during this encounter.

item.title: Dragonscale Dagger
item.fluff: This dagger isn't literally a dragon scale, but it's shaped like one its magic kicks in when your Dragon Magic snarls into force after you are bloodied

block.name: Property
block.line: When your Sorcerer class feature Scales of the Dragon triggers, you also get a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with melee and close attacks using this dagger until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Duelist's Bow
item.fluff: With this mighty weapon humming as you release arrow after arrow, enemy ranged combatants are forced to focus on you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to ranged and area attack rolls against creatures other you until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Duelist's Blade
item.fluff: The favorite weapon of a rogue

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have combat advantage against the target

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou have combat advantage against the first creature you attack using this weapon during your current turn.

item.title: Dwarven Thrower
item.fluff: The weighted haft of this mithral weapon is engraved with images of giants being struck down by dwarven throwing hammers

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus on ranged Weapon attacks against Large or larger creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: This weapon gains the Heavy Thrown property with a range of 5/10.
If you have the Dwarven Weapon Proficiency racial trait, the range is instead 7/15.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a Large or larger creature with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering attack deals 2 extra damage against the triggering creature, or 3 extra damage if the triggering attack was ranged.
Level 74 extra damage, or 6 extra damage.
Level 126 extra damage, or 9 extra damage.
Level 178 extra damage, or 12 extra damage.
Level 2210 extra damage, or 15 extra damage.
Level 2712 extra damage, or 18 extra damage.

item.title: Eager Weapon
item.fluff: Your psionic energy primes this weapon to surge into action when an enemy tries to slip past your guard

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus on opportunity attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks made with this weapon.

item.title: Earth-Splitter Axe
item.fluff: This stone-headed axe bears Primordial runes, which shine with dread power as you grip its handle

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you hit one or more targets with a Weapon attack using this axe and the attack has the Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder keyword, you gain temporary hit points equal to twice this axe's enhancement bonus. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your second wind
EffectYou create a zone of coruscating elements in a close burst 2 until the end of your next turn.
Level 19, 24 or 29Close burst 3.
The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies.

item.title: Earth-Wrought Hammer
item.fluff: This hammer appears to be carved from a single piece of stone, though it's no heavier than a normal weapon, and hits your enemies like a battering ram

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: The target is knocked prone, or +1d6 damage per plus if the target was already prone

item.title: Echoing Songblade
item.fluff: The echoes of your spells reverberate in the blade, hoping to be unleashed

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus; when using a bard attack, you can choose to make this thunder damage

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a bard encounter attack using this songblade, you can use the same power again on your next turn. You must still spend the usual action to use it, but take a -2 penalty to the attack roll and can only target a single creature, regardless of how many targets the triggering power has.

item.title: Entrapping Weapon
item.fluff: A projectile fired from this weapon keeps your enemy from wandering off

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or 1 damage per plus and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Exciccating Weapon
item.fluff: Glowing with crimson light, this weapon leeches moisture from the air around you

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire and necrotic damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: Creatures that have vulnerable fire or vulnerable necrotic treat damage from this weapon as being fire and necrotic for the purposes of those vulnerabilities.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy takes additional fire and necrotic damage from the triggering attack equal to twoce this weapon's enhancement bonus, and is dazed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Farbond Spellblade
item.fluff: When bonded to you, this spellblade returns to your hand faster and from farther distances

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 per plus when used as an implement for an arcane power

block.name: Properties
block.line: If you have the Swordbond feature and use it with this weapon, you gain the following benefits:
The weapon has the Heavy Thrown weapon property, and a range of 5/10.
You can call this weapon to your hand from up to a mile away.

item.title: Firewind Blade
item.fluff: The air around the long blade shimmers as if it were emitting heat

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire damage per plus, and you can slide the target 1 square per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you hit one or more targets with a Fire attack using this blade, one enemy adjacent to you takes fire damage after the attack has been resolved. The fire damage equals 2 + twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your second wind during your turn
EffectUntil the end of your next turn, melee attacks made with this blade deal extra fire damage equal to 1 + this blade's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Flail of Winds
item.fluff: This flail's bludgeoning head is scribed with runes of elemental magic that form creases and grooves and, when swung, it whistles like a howling wind

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with an attack that pushs, pulls, or slides the target

block.name: Property
block.line: When you push, pull or slide a creature with an attack using this flail, you increase the maximum distance by 1 square.
Level 13 or 18By 2 squares.
Level 23 or 28By 3 squares.

item.title: Flameburst Weapon
item.fluff: This ranged weapon packs a fiery surprise

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectThe next ranged basic attack you make with this weapon before the end of your current turn becomes a burst 1 centered on the target and you make the attack against each creature in the burst.
Level 23 or 28Burst 2.
Use your normal attack bonus for the basic attack, but against Reflex.
The original target takes normal damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) on a hit. Other targets only take ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) on a hit.
Level 13 or 18Ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Level 23 or 28Ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).

item.title: Flesh Seeker
item.fluff: Thinner than most weapons of its type, this weapon slips between armored plates and even magic defenses

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectYou gain a +2 item bonus to the first attack roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of the encounter.

item.title: Flesh Grinder
item.fluff: This weapon screeches as its serrated edge bites through flesh, bone, and steel

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an attack with this weapon that targets AC
EffectThe triggering attack targets Fortitude instead, and deals +1d6 extra damage.
Level 13 or 18+2d6 extra damage.
Level 23 or 28+3d6 extra damage.

item.title: Foe Maker Weapon
item.fluff: No enemy can look upon this foul weapon and not hate both it and its wielder

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against a target marked by you

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (each enemy that can see you in burst); You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Foe-Seeking Bow
item.fluff: You feel the bow's hate for cowardly and furtive opponents

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target that has concealment or cover against the attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an attack using this weapon and target an enemy benefiting from any concealment or cover
EffectFor the triggering attack, the enemy does not benefit from concealment or cover. You still receive the increased critical damage.

item.title: Forester's Axe
item.fluff: This normal-looking axe cuts a swath through plant life of all sorts

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against plant creatures

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose blast 3; You destroy vegetation, changing all difficult terrain made up primarily of flora in the blast to normal terrain.
Level 12 or 17Close blast 5.
Level 22 or 27This power can be used as an encounter power. You also change all challenging and blocking terrain made up primarily of flora in the blast to difficult terrain.

item.title: Frightful Cleaver
item.fluff: The blade of this axe is a terror to behold, as are the jagged wounds it causes

item.title: Frost Fury Weapon
item.fluff: When this axe's wielder is bloodied, it becomes icy and promises a cold death with each swing

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 cold damage per plus, or +1d10 cold damage per plus while you're bloodied

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain an item bonus to damage with this axe equal to 2 + the weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Frost Weapon
item.fluff: A thin layer of frost coats the business end of this weapons

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYour Weapon attacks with this weapon that deal untyped damage deal cold damage instead. The attacks gain the Cold keyword.
If a Weapon attack you make already has a damage type, the type is changed to cold and the corresponding keyword is replaced with Cold.
Using this power again ends the effect.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy takes an extra +1d6 cold damage and and is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18+2d6 cold damage.
Level 23 or 28+3d6 cold damage.

item.title: Gambler's Weapon
item.fluff: Favored by scoundrels and rogues, this unpredictable blade is not for the faint of heart

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and you can shift 1 square

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are about to make an attack roll with this weapon
EffectRoll 1d6 and subtract 3; the result is a power bonus or a penalty to your attack roll.

item.title: Ghost Dance Weapon
item.fluff: You react to an enemy's attack with a lightning-fast strike, then slip away within a shroud of shadow

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with opportunity attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you make a Weapon attack with this weapon while you have total concealment, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage from a melee attack by an enemy marked by you
EffectYou make a melee basic attack using this weapon against the triggering enemy.
Augment 2: The attack deals +1[W] extra damage.
You then shift a number of squares equal to the weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Goblin Totem
item.fluff: This crude weapon is carved from bone, its handle wrapped with leather -holding the totem makes you feel more capable of facing even formidably sized foes

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Weapon attacks with this weapon gain an item bonus to damage rolls against a creature larger than you. The item bonus equals this weapon's plus.

item.title: Goring Weapon
item.fluff: Scored and scratched as it is, this weapon is more than serviceable

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee Weapon attack using this weapon

EffectThe triggering enemy is immobilized until the start of your next turn or until it is no longer within your reach. While this effect lasts, you cannot make attacks using this weapon, and cannot willingly move so that the triggering enemy is no longer within your reach, unless you drop the weapon, in which case the effect also ends.

If you or the triggering enemy is pushed, pulled or slid so that it is no longer within your reach, the enemy takes damage equal to twice this weapon's enhancement bonus and the effect immediately ends.

item.title: Great Hunger Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon's normal low keening tones build into a great hown when it engages in battle

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a Weapon attack using this weapon, after the critical has been resolved, this weapon's critical damage increases by +1d8 damage. This effect is cumulative until the end of the encounter.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy within reach of this weapon scores a critical hit against you
EffectThe triggering enemy takes damage equal to this weapon's critical damage, including the additional damage from the property.

item.title: Guardian's Brand
item.fluff: This weapon burns white with hatred when it's near a warden's marked enemy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire damage per plus, or +1d8 fire damage per plus while you're in a Guardian Form

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with your warden's fury class power using this weapon
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing fire damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals 2 + your Strength modifier.
Level 13 or 18Equals 6 + your Strength modifier.
Level 23 or 28Equals 10 + your Strength modifier.

item.title: Gutting Weapon
item.fluff: This blade slides easily past armor and through the thickest hide, though pulling it out is not so easy - on the target

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with a Weapon attack using this weapon
EffectThe target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Guardian's Call
item.fluff: Decorated with the sigils of the wind and the oak, this weapon increases your defenses while you're in your guardian form

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you're in a guardian form

block.name: Property
block.line: When you assume a guardian form, pick one defense other than AC. You gain a +2 bonus to that defense while you are in that guardian form.

item.title: Hammer of Victory
